name: Project-KOI
description:
"Project-KOI" is a Bullet-Hell game made in Unity, with a retro style and music.

Face the enemy ships in this frenetic game, where you must defeat the hordes of enemies and their different bosses in the 5 levels of this new experience.

There are 2 levels of difficulty, normal and hard, where each one is a completely different experience.

You get a star in your save game for every level you clear without a hit.

Can you have your game in the highest difficulty and without hits?
